turns.speaker: cashier

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I wanted to ask some questions about Peet's Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I'd like to order a golden caffè latte, but I was wondering what comes in there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: golden cafe latte contains honey.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is there any milk in that? Cuz I'm lactose intolerant.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you may customize the drink's milk option if you'd like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What type of milk options do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: peet's coffee has Non-fat, 2%, Whole, Soy, and Almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, what time of flavors can I put in there? Or can I add some whip cream if I wanted?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, you could add whipped cream. the flavors provided at peet's are Vanilla, Sugar-free vanilla, Maple, Hazelnut, Sugar-free chocolate sauce, Cinnabon Bun.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you know if the 151365 Park Street, Alameda, California has this option available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, all peet's have the same standardized menu.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, that's great to hear. I'd like to make one for a pick up there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, and what was the drink you wanted?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted the golden cafe latte.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: But instead of steamed milk and milk foam, I would like it to be almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so to confirm, you'd like the golden cafe latte with almond milk at peet's on park street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.00 will be the total. would you like to order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like to pick it up as soon as possible.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Cool. Your drink will be ready Peet's in 9 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else i can help with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool take care.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
